reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: UNHCR regional humanitarian aid to the Syrian crisis

description.narrative: Support to the Office of the High Commissioner for Refugees UNHCR for its operations in Syria and the neighbouring countries as part of the consolidated appeals for Syria (Syria Humanitarian Assistance Response Plan SHARP) and the regional appeal (Syria Re gional Refugee Response Plan RRP6). UNHCR is carrying out a refugee operation of historical proportions in Syria's neighbouring countries (Lebanon Jordan Iraq Turkey Egypt) to provide assistance to over 24 million refugees. it also provides humanitarian ai d to over three million internally displaced persons in syria. UNHCR needs over 16 billion USD (12 billion euros) to its operations for the Syria crisis which makes up nearly a third of the organization's global budget.
